caption: Recently refurbished, but nothing changed with the amazing food and service, really lovely staff.
First time out here, I was in the area for work and im glad I stopped food was great, tasted great, definitely going back like this week.
I really liked the dishes and customer service, great area very close to my home. The workers are always nice. Will come visit again.
First time getting this place and it was amazing, we got all the appetizers to try and loved them all
Everything was right on the money..... Will go back again...
I love this korean place. Spicy fried rice ball is the best. If you're looking for authentic korean food in Chicago, don't hesitate to be here. Place and staff are great!

Everything my lil lady and I tried was absolutely delicious. Way above what our expectations were initially. We ordered inferno versions of spicy chicken and pork belly, which were both perfectly spicy without being overbearing on the flavors of the meats. The kimchi and kimchi slaw were perfectly seasoned, the mushrooms and corn salad were tasty, even the plain white rice was really good blended with everything. We also tried the dumplings, "fries" and the cheese balls. All I can say is...we couldn't stop eating even after we ate everything in our main dishes. I would absolutely love to go back ASAP.

Always hot, fresh and incredibly tasty. Authentic flavors and great service. Highly recommend the pork belly (spicy with sauce on the side is 👌🏼) and the KFIRE spicy chicken. The soy/ginger beef is also amazing. Always made to order but incredibly fast and never had a bad experience after ordering from here 10+ times. You will regret not giving this great Korean spot a try. I always go for the delicious kimchi and pickled daikon for sides because they are honestly some the tastiest veggies I’ve ever had and I don’t like veggies haha. Kimchi honestly could use a little more spice maybe but the flavor is delicious and not overpoweringly salty like some kimchi you get. Honestly everything is good. Go try it now!
Amazing atmosphere.
I have zero complaints about this restaurant. It's really good!
Some of the best Korean bbq I’ve had in Chicago! Highly recommend.
This restaurant is unbelievably affordable! The food is great too!
Orderd from KFIRE last night and was blown away. I highly recommend grabing some amazing Korean BBQ from these guys, they won't disappoint!!
Absolute top notch food. Extremely flavorful
Great flavor and value!
I randomly stopped in because the sign caught my eye. Bottom line, the food is fantastic! A great idea when you want something new/different.

First time delivery customer. Food is bomb. As a Korean, I finally feel I have a place to order authentic Korean food by my place. Food portions are good, I got double meat which saved me. I'm stuffed. Taste reminds me of the food I grew up eating. KFIRE has got it down. Also, delivery was under 40-minutes which is a huge plus lol

This place is AMAZING. We’ve been numerous times, and you can’t go wrong with anything on the menu!! I most recently had the inferno spicy chicken—incredible!!  Can’t say enough good things about this restaurant. If you’re looking for excellent, quick, tasty food, then this is your spot!
Delicious just wish portions of meat were bigger if you stop here always get double meat trust me
Wow. Everything was really flavorful and sides seemed super fresh. Super easy to order through their website for very safe pickup at their window. Will be coming here often when in the area.
Splendid.
I don't review unless it's REALLY GOOD or REALLY BAD. This was amazing! 11/10 across the board: quality of food, service, ready right away... Honestly amazed! Please order, you won't be disappointed!

KFire is delicious!! I loved the soy ginger beef and my husband’s spicy chicken was great too. Both meats were juicy and flavorful. I want to try more sides, but the cucumber and daikon were fantastic. I’d order the bokki fries again but the KFire balls were just a bit too cheesy.  Service was fast and friendly. I was super impressed with their compostable take out containers (paper bottoms and PLA commercially compostable lids). We’ll be back soon!

I don’t normally write reviews but this place IS TOO GOOD NOT TO TALK ABOUT!! It’s absolutely amazing! The food options are great and the taste of the food is consistently delicious. The food is freshly made by the amazing chefs. My favorites are the Kalbi and Bokki fires, HIGHLY RECOMMEND although I would also recommend everything on the menu. The workers there are super friendly and welcoming. The restaurant is very clean and organized in both the look of it and in the workers. Overall the environment at KFire is just great and definitely worth the visit!

I don't normally write reviews... but... folks, this place is incredible.  Love the apps.  The kimchi rice KFire balls are incredible - crispy on the outside, melting cheese and perfection on the inside.  The Bokki Fries are amazing as well.  The main courses are seasoned so well and cooked to perfection.  Sampled some of each of the Chicken, Ginger Beef, and Pork Belly and it was all amazing.  Heck, even the rice was so well done.  We had carryout that we brought to the suburbs and it also traveled super well.  Great option for carryout and catering.  Definitely will do again soon.

This place is perfect! There aren't many places in the city to get quick, good Korean food. The portions are large, the meat (I got the Kalbi plate) is nicely marinated and tender, and the sides are all fresh and delicious. The staff was friendly as well.  If you're craving good Korean food and don't want to sit at a KBBQ restaurant (whenever the pandemic is over), definitely check this place out!  You can trust me, in the words of Dave Chappelle - "I AM KOREAN"
This place is awesome!
Got Kalbi BBQ plate with pickled mushrooms and Kim Chi. Very delicious 😋. If this is your first time- let them know and they will explain the menu to you. Very helpful staff and great food!
Delicious spot! Great portions & combinations. The Kalbi beef was perfect, so were the Korean pickles and kimchi slaw! Make sure you get a sweet bun to end the perfect meal. Kind & great Staff!

The portions of whatever you order are really good. Combinations of either meat, side dishes, or vegetables of whatever you want to order all FUSE together and taste pretty decent. This all works really well if you are eating with others or sharing, or just like variety. This place is great and I would highly recommend whether just eating by yourself or going with a few friends. Staff was very friendly also and quick with timing. Overall I give this place an  A+. Awesome!!!!!! :)
Food was Ahhhmazing!! Super fresh. The owner was really nice and super friendly. Will Most Definitely be back
Heavenly!
First timer - fire chicken, kimchi slaw, and marinated mushrooms 🙌🏽. Flavors on-point. Great service, too! A couple tables outside on the sidewalk. Will be back!

Goodness gracious great balls of Kfire! Great fast casual spot in Logan Square for quick Korean eats such as Kalbi and pork belly--all grilled to order. The Kfire balls are aranchini-like balls with spam, kimchi and cheese inside that are to die for. That cheese pull tho! Def worth checking out.
Everything we ate was so delicious! The Kalbi plate the meat was tender and flavorful and the sides really tasty. Good portion size. The bokki fries are a MUST! And the Kfire balls are so so good.

Logan Square is like the Mecca of amazing local restaurants in Chicago so our expectations were set pretty high. My husband and I tried the kalbi, pork belly, and the soy ginger chicken - all were delicious and perfectly seasoned! The staff were friendly, and more importantly the restaurant was CLEAN! Plus there’s a walk-up window for added Covid precaution and convenience. With so many other items to try, we will definitely be back!  Pro-tip: Don’t sleep on the Kfire balls! Even as takeout they were still crispy and cheesy when we got home.
Could you Believe it!!!  IT’S not MEAT,
Try the spicy chicken.  Nice addition to Logan Square
Meat was juicy and tender. Service was friendly and clean.
It was really good! I felt like I was eating light but healthy.

So yummyy!! Great cooking and tastes just as if you were to have a chef at home. It's so awesome that Korean food has now been made simple and you don't need to go to some nice restaurant to have some. The price is great and the food is so good. Really friendly staff and so respectful. Props guy. Always love getting food from here. Me and my husband come here all the time.

So. Good. Fast Casual Korean in Logan Square. KFire serves delicious Korean fare for anyone who likes tasty food - not just for Korean-Americans who are used to the flavors. My favorite dish is the KFire chicken - perfect amount of spice with rice and my favorite appetizer is the Kimchi Fried Rice Balls - I could eat a dozen of these and then die happy.
Great food. Friendly staff. Will definitely be back on my next trip to Chicago.
The best Korean food around here. Everyone was very friendly.
The pork belly and the kalbi were outta this world! The Bokki fries were super tasty too, as were all the sides. Can't wait to go back!

Excellent staff, food was great. It’s a fantastic way for people who are either familiar with Korean food or curious about Korean food to get a fast, fresh meal.  DO NOT miss the Korean fries, made of rice cakes the sauce and the texture is incredible.  I hope these guys are around for a long time.
Good food good people and good price

I was super excited to hear that Logan Square was getting a place that you can get quick, authentic Korean BBQ and boy, did this place really deliver! I got the pork belly and it was DELICIOUS! Fresh, grilled to order, and in a timely fashion - it can't get any better than that! Can't wait to come back and try out more of their menu!
Thankyou from the Logan Square Tattoo team - we really enjoyed our lunch the other day.  Great to have new options in the area! 100% will be back :)
The food is really fresh and tastes delicious. Glad to have a quick, fresh, place to grab a meal!

In short - fast, delicious Korean BBQ.  I got the "KFire" spicy chicken plate with extra kalbi (photo).  It was grilled to order, and I was digging in within minutes of ordering.  Fresh, filling, and so good.  The chicken was the best.  I ate inside, but it seems like a great option for a quick grab-and-go meal or delivery.  The bokki "fries" were really unique and tasty too.  I haven't tried everything on the menu yet, but I plan to!  Hit this place up as soon as you can.
KFire is incredible! Every bite was memorable and packed with flavor. Quick service and great price point! Go now!
Best Korean food around. Great people as well! Highly recommend this place for anyone in the area. Carry out process is great as well.

Just sayin’... I’m addicted to Kfire. First time I’ve had the pleasure of enjoying a quick meal there, I went back for the next two days with other friends.  It’s so tasty!  It’s a refreshing, and satisfying fast food meal.  It gets a bit drab choosing the big-box, fast food chains.  You will look forward to your next meal at Kfire once you’ve eaten there. I also hear they will have a yummy Kfire dessert down the road, which I’m looking forward to as well! For those of you doing your part to social distance, not to worry.  This place is clean, organized, and very mindful of the community and current times. Excellent!
Quick & Delicious food, highly recommended!

I Like trying new places in Logan Square  And LOVE being pleasantly surprised. Check out KFire for Korean barbecue on Milwaukee Ave, a block East from the monument.  It’s a fresh, fast, and DELICIOUS!!! They have vegetarian and gluten free options too :) No processed food! HEALTHY and fresh. Great option for a quick lunch as well as dinner. My fave: Bokki “fries”😋
LOVE! Quick, filling, and wholesome food that taste great. The Bokki fries are soooo good. 100% recommend :)
The bokki fries are amazing! They are small nuggets of spicy goodness with cheese curds like Korean poutine. Definite must try, quick and friendly service!

Phenomenal Korean BBQ, great atmosphere, and priced well. The secret is in the ownership though. Ben & Eddie are good people!!! I highly recommend KFire. You'll leave with a full stomach and high spirits.
This logan square gem just opened and is already one of my favorite korean restaurants in chicago

I have had a couple of meals here since it’s opening, and it is absolutely delicious. The short rib is amazing along with the mushroom. The Bokki fries are out of this world and it’s an excellent spin on noodles. All the sides are crisp & fresh. Trust me, you’ll not be disappointed with this place.
I’ve been waiting for the grand opening and it did not disappoint!! Can’t wait to go back for the spicy chicken, corn and RICE BALLS!!

Porkbelly - 5 out of 5 - tender and super flavorful.  Fire chicken - 5 out of 5 - great heat.  Fried spicy rice balls - 5 out of 5 - there’s cheese in these!!  Cheesy corn - 5 out of 5 - your side if you love cheese and garlic.

K-Fire is an awesome spot for a unique spin on Korean. Got the Kalbi, K-Fire Balls and Bokki Fries. All unique in their flavors and well prepared by the gourmet trained chef / owner. Great value and quick service. Definitely recommend this spot for a tasty lunch or dinner. Enjoy!

Pork belly and kimchi rice balls all day, every day and I'm set for life!!!  Went there on a Wednesday night with one of my gfs.  She had the ginger soy beef and we shared the risotto-like balls with spam, chesse and kimchi.  We both agreed that we should order this each time we come back to this fast-Korean-grilled restaurant.  Going back very soon!  On the hitlist: kalbi and bokki fries!!!  This restaurant may have a fast food and casual feeling to it but the service is personal and top notch!
So yummy! Fast, clean, and good food! Great addition to this area. It’s a must try, definitely will be returning! Curious about the salad with the pineapple vinaigrette and spicy chicken bowl!
Amazing food and amazing service.  Definitely a must try!

Fast and delicious Korean bbq plates. Love the vegan options! Can’t go wrong with anything on the menu - so hard to pick what I want to eat each time I go. I want to eat it all! Bokki fries and Kfire rice balls are amazing. Friendly and fast service. :)

Finally, a one stop shop to get my favorite Korean dishes.  Kfire’s take on Kalbi (Korean short ribs), Pork Belly, Spicy Chicken, Brisket Salad, and Ddukbokki are delicious and make up just a fraction of Kfire’s offerings.  There’s something for everyone here: meat lovers?  Check.  Vegan? Check. Kids menu? Check.  I had the pleasure of eating here with wife and kids twice since their opening and I’ll be headed back again soon to try more of the menu.  Another bonus is that Kfire is conveniently located near the highway and street parking is readily available so traveling from the suburbs has been a breeze.
Amazing food and great customer service. The food is fresh too! And those rice balls- those are a must try! Don’t walk, RUN to K-Fire and get your taste of some great Korean food!!
I've never had Korean food but I'm glad I came here. The menu is really simple and the sides are right there where you could see them. The food is delicious!
Amazing food. Great clean flavors, nicely balanced. absolutely loved it. Will be a regular here.
Must try these fried rice balls!
